view_and_create_batch_report_jobs: View and create Batch Report jobs. Analyse 100s or 1000s of companies at once by simply uploading a .csv with the company number and country code.
upload_company_numbers_and_country_codes: Upload company numbers and country codes to start.
utilise_our_powerful_automated_reports_a: Utlise our powerful Automated Reports at scale and get insights across 1000s of companies at once.
in_order_to_use_our_batch_reporting_feat: In order to use our Batch Reporting feature you need to upload the company IDs in the correct format. Please download and use this template.
upload_your_csv_here_to_begin: Upload your CSV here to begin.
download_the_results_of_the_batch_report: Download the result of the Batch Reports in CSV or Excel format and see a quick overview of all the results below.
file_is_invalid_format: File is invalid, please upload a CSV
all_results_in_a_single_csv: All results in a single CSV great for using in a variety of formats.
open_excel_immediately: Open in Excel immediately and review the data to quickly gain insights.
